<casebody firstpage="441" lastpage="442" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
 <parties id="p-1">
  In re J.J.
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  No. 15A07.
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>
 <decisiondate id="p-4">
  July 24, 2007.
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-5">
  Jil Sanchez, for Gaston County DSS.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-6">
  Laura Crawford, for Perry Bobbin.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-7">
  Ed Bogle, for Guardian Ad Litem.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-8">
  Wendy C. Sotolongo, Durham, for Mother.
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-9">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of July 2007 by Respondent to Withdraw as Counsel:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-10">
  "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of July 2007."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-11">
   HUDSON, J., recused.
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
